entries.title: Intercept the Rebel transmission.
entries.found_loc: We've found an ideal location to intercept the Rebel beam-wave transmission. Go there now.
entries.arrived_at_loc: The Rebel transmission will be easy to intercept here. Don't stray too far from this point. The transmission should start at any moment.
entries.transmission_start: pcontrast3 Comm Computer: < pcontrast1 Rebel transmission detected. Recording started. pcontrast3 >
entries.trans_update: pcontrast3 Comm Computer: < pcontrast1 %DI% of Rebel transmission received. pcontrast3 >
entries.transmission_received: pcontrast3 Comm Computer: < pcontrast1 100% of transmission received. Checksum validation complete. Transmission is authentic. pcontrast3 >
entries.mission_complete: Good job, return to base with the transmission!
entries.outofrange: pcontrast3 Comm Computer: < ff0000 Transmission signal fading. Signal is too distant! pcontrast3 >
entries.outofrange_failed: pcontrast3 Comm Computer: < ff0000 Transmission signal lost! pcontrast3 >
entries.first_attack: System scans have detected enemy ships at lightspeed moving in your direction. You've been detected. Defend yourself, but get that transmission!
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Enemy ships detected on attack vector. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Enemy attack wing has been eliminated. pcontrast3 >
